item.title: Volks 9-160 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 22, 2025

Volks 9-160 v1.0 ETS2

The Volkswagen Delivery 9-160 is a light truck from the German automaker, known for its versatility and fuel economy, ideal for urban and short- to medium-distance deliveries. It is part of the Delivery line, one of Volkswagen Trucks and Buses’ most popular models.
Main Features
Engine: The truck is equipped with a 3.8L Cummins ISF inline-four engine. This engine delivers a maximum power of 160 hp at 2,600 rpm and a maximum torque of 600 Nm between 1,300 and 1,700 rpm. The engine is known for its good performance and low fuel consumption.
Transmission: The transmission is manual, typically a 5-speed ZF S5 420 HD with one reverse gear. The gearbox is robust and well-sized for the vehicle’s purpose.
Payload Capacity: The name “9-160” already suggests its main specifications: the “9” represents the Gross Vehicle Weight (GVW) of 9 tons, and the “160” refers to the 160 horsepower. Payload capacity can vary, but is generally around 5,760 kg, making it one of the most competitive in its segment.
Cabin: The Delivery 9-160’s cabin was designed to be practical and comfortable for everyday use. It is spacious, well-finished, and offers excellent visibility, as well as a number of storage compartments to make life easier for the driver.
Safety: Regarding safety, the model features air drum brakes on the front and rear wheels and an ABS braking system with EBD (Electronic Brake Distribution), which increases safety during emergency braking.
The Volks 9-160 is a popular choice for transport companies and freelancers working in a variety of sectors, such as beverage delivery, food logistics, and general cargo transportation, both in cities and on regional roads.

Credits: rc mods

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Mercedes-Benz 710 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 22, 2025

Mercedes-Benz 710 v1.0 ETS2

Key Aspects of the Mercedes-Benz 710 Mod in ETS2
Brazilian Style: Mods for the MB 710 are created with a focus on Brazilian truck culture. This means they often come with a variety of accessories and customizations that are common on real-life trucks in Brazil, such as:
Custom chassis: Options for different chassis types, including a “baú” (box truck), “carga seca” (flatbed), and even a “boiadeira” (livestock carrier).
Accessories: A huge number of accessories like custom bumpers, horns, a variety of paint jobs and decals, and other unique cosmetic parts.
Interior details: The mods usually have a detailed interior with customizable elements to give it that authentic Brazilian feel.
Engine and Performance: The mods try to replicate the real-life performance of the MB 710, but often with added options for gameplay. You’ll find:
Realistic engines: The mods will feature the correct engine models, often with custom sound packs to replicate the unique engine sound of the MB 710.
Variety of options: Some mods will have a variety of engine tunings, from the standard horsepower to more powerful versions for a better experience in the game.
Mod Availability: You can find mods for the Mercedes-Benz 710 in several places:
Free Mods: Many mod creators release free versions of the truck on sites like the Steam Workshop or on external websites like YouTube channels. Be aware that the quality of free mods can vary.
Paid Mods: Some of the most detailed and high-quality mods are paid. This is because creating a realistic and feature-rich truck model takes a significant amount of time and effort. You can find these on dedicated modding websites.
Compatibility: Before downloading any mod, it’s crucial to check its compatibility with your current version of ETS2. Mods from a few versions back might not work correctly or could cause your game to crash.

Credits: chava

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: Sud de France Map v2.0.1 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 22, 2025

Sud de France Map v2.0.1 1.55 ETS2

Changelog V2.0
Added compatibility to 1.55 version of the game.
Added village of Roumazières, and an Highway construction site
Re – Added Chambery, with plenty of real custom companies
Added Corbas and it’s M.I.N

NEW –> V2.0.1
Fixed bugs

DLC France, Greece, West Balkan and Scandinavia are mandatory, Baltic, Ibéria, East Balkan and Italia dlc are strongly recommended
Compatible Promods, place Sud de France above Promods
Game version : V1.55

item.title: Western Star 4900 Addon v0.1 1.55 ATS
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 22, 2025

Western Star 4900 Addon v0.1 1.55 ATS

This is a very early WIP mod that adds the 4900 EX/SF Hoods to the SCS 5700xe.
YOU WILL HAVE TO BUILD AND CONFIGURE THE TRUCK PROPERLY RIGHT NOW FROM THE 5700xe..
Swap out all 5700 parts and replace with 4900 parts.
Plan to update as a go starting out a couple times a week.
Currently this mod adds: SF/EX 4900 HOOD, EXHAUST,STEERING WHEELS,BUMPERS,TANKS,MANUAL SHIFTER, and more.

Credits: Turkey
